resources.string: Launches a spinning blade of pain, dealing high damage and impailing enemies to walls.
Drops a smoke bomb that stuns enemies and obscures their vision, rendering Ash invisible for a short time.
Ash teleports towards the target, bringing them into melee range.
Ash goes on a rampage, teleporting and destroying nearby enemies.
Banshee emits a sonic shockwave that pushes targets in range with enough force to incapacitate or kill attackers.
Using acoustic location, Banshee\'s sonar power finds and tracks enemies and exposes critical weak points to everyone in your squad.

Ideal for stealth and intrusion situations, using Silence on unaware enemies will limit their perceptions and tactical response. Warframe attacks, gunfire, and enemy deaths will not trigger enemy awareness while Silence is active.
Channeling all of her acoustic energy into the ground and surrounding environment structures. Banshee uses ultrasonic reverberations to violently shake the environment with lethal results.
Launches a fiery projectile. It deals high fire damage on contact and moderate fire damage to any who enter the lingering flames.
Stun nearby enemies with strong accelerant. Increases all fire damage delt.
Slams the ground for high damage in a small radius and creates a persistent ring of fire which deals high damage over time.
